name: Rapid Strike Scroll of Swirls
effect: The Rapid Strike Pokémon this card is attached to can use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: Matchless Maelstrom
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to each of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
